Of the letters specified or referred to by Bruni in his Vita two only are now extant, namely the abusive letter to the Florentines (Epist. vi), and that to the Emperor Henry (Epist, vii). The letter ‘ Popule mee ⁹ may perhaps be identified with the first of those mentioned by Villani 2 —that written by Dante to complain of his undeserved exile from Florence. For the remainder Bruni is our sole authority.
